page.title: 18Typical Days
page.content: {A typical weekday in our house.} My mother goes to work and comes home about four o'clock. My brother goes to a day nursery. When my mother returns she lets the dog out and starts cook- ing. She then sits down in the lounge and reads, while I do some work and practise my recorder.Afterwards I read a book or play outside. After tea I have a bath or watch TV. I go to bed at nine o'clock. Makimo Yamaguchi, Pickhurst. {A typical Sunday in our house.} Dad sometimes goes to work for half a day. About one o'clock we normally have a roast dinner.It's nearly always chic- ken but occasionally beef or lamb.We go to see nanny. Occasionally we walk the dog on Hayes Common.Sometimes Dad takes us swimming.In the evening we may watch TV or play Business or Monopoly. Sally Norris, Pickhurst.
